# Steps:

1. compiled and cleaning occurrence data for species. Here we use 2 workflows for this step:

    - rocc (https://github.com/saramortara/rocc)
    
    - CoordinateCleaner (https://github.com/ropensci/CoordinateCleaner)
    
2. Climatic variables. We use two dataset of climatic variables.
 
      - Paleoclim: Describe beter why I choose this (in this case is about resoltuion te time periods      available, the most complete and recent data)
      - Chelsa:  
    
3. Exploratory Analysis 

      - Extract enviromental values values to point 
      - Build a principal component analysis (PCA)
      - Select the most imporant variables for species
      
4. Niche analysis 

      - Niche similarity using humbolds package (https://github.com/jasonleebrown/humboldt)
      
5. Ecological Niche models using two different approaches and two different workflows

      - modler package: using diffents algorithms to map niches suitablity  (https://github.com/Model-R,     https://github.com/Model-R/modleR).
      
      - ntoolb package: using using ellipsoids to model niches suitability (https://github.com/luismurao/ntbox/)
